unnormalised: Mumbai, India – Telecom operators are increasingly forging strategic partnerships with Over-The-Top (OTT) platforms to bolster user engagement and expand revenue streams. Bharti Airtel recently announced a collaboration with Zee5, offering bundled subscriptions to its prepaid and postpaid customers.
